Articles.Content:
Picked up my laptop to play kerbal and saw ants on grouind near my laptop now i get them on the run while on my laptop.

DIE DIE DIE!
I'd scream like a girl in public if I saw ants crawling out my laptop
stop using your laptop as a table
Be careful they may be small but their mandipals are pretty strong and they could clip some wires

stop using your laptop as a table

Lol it was charging on my desk. I dislike tablets.

Haha, they're stealing your laptop piece-by-piece! I hate ants... Where I live, not even knotting up a bag and hanging up will keep hundreds of ants getting at my food... They're constantly in the cupboards trying to find a way at my trail mix, lol.
I never thought ants had a demand for prosthetic limbs and machines.
